Program_Policies: A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).; Note: BMB 408 and BMB 496 may not be used to fulfill requirements for the minor.
